# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# C extensions
*.so

# Distribution / packaging
dist/
build/
eggs/
*.egg-info/

# Virtual environments
myenv/
venv/
env/
ENV/

# Django static files directory
static/

# Django media files directory
media/

# Database files
*.sqlite3
*.db
*.db.sqlite3

# Log files
*.log

# Generated files by coverage.py
.coverage
htmlcov/

# IDE-specific files (e.g., PyCharm, VSCode, etc.)
.idea/
.vscode/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace

# OS-specific files (e.g., macOS, Linux, Windows)
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Other generated files
db.sqlite3
*.pyc
__pycache__/
